pullrequest.title: Check if visuals are ancestors or descendants

content.html:
Do you think you include a fix for a homebrew warning that came from pull request #1838?

diff -r 46fb859b3958 test/integration/physics_msgs.cc
--- a/test/integration/physics_msgs.cc  Tue Aug 04 09:14:41 2015 -0700
+++ b/test/integration/physics_msgs.cc  Tue Aug 04 10:56:28 2015 -0700
@@ -887,7 +887,7 @@
   model->FillMsg(msg);

   // only ode supports gearbox joint
-  unsigned jointSize = 2;
+  int jointSize = 2;
   if (_physicsEngine == "ode")
     jointSize = 3;
